page.title: 07The Village Stores at Lavant
page.content: The Village Store sells - Newspapers, Magazines, Confectioery, Groceries, Cigarettes, Ice-cream, Frozen Foods, Vegetables, Tobbacco, some Toys, Bread, Spices, Cake decorations, Cards, Soap Powder, cleaners, and Medicines.The Store has eleven paper rounds.Thirteen paper girls and boys.They deliver to West- Stoke, Summersdale, Lavant Down Estate,St.Nicholas, West Lavant, East Lavant, Binderton, Chilgrove, East Marden, Up Marden, North Marden and Mid Lavant.Mr.Sweeney(the owner)does the Sunday country round while his Farther-in-law looks after the shop. They have 500 regular newspaper custormers and 200 regular customer The majority of these are people who live in the village.The shop advertises posters for 10p per week.
